article_title: Longmont's Cinco de Mayo: Dancing, cars and beautiful Chihuahuas
article_text:
(Cliff Grassmick / Staff Photographer)

Mustangs first semifinals trip well worth it no matter outcome

Among the five seniors on the Dawson School baseball team that attend the school, you're not likely going to see tears shed at the fact they won't be tossing their graduation caps or walking the diploma line with their classmates Saturday morning.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Staff Report

twitter.description: Cinco de Mayo revelers turned out to Longmont's Roosevelt Park today for the city's 13th annual celebration, which saw traditional dances, a host of live entertainment, a car show and a Chihuahua beauty contest.
twitter.title: Longmont's Cinco de Mayo: Dancing, cars and beautiful Chihuahuas
